channel.title: Post here if you dont like it when you post a tutorial, and dunno where it goes
channel.description:
Long title...But does anybody else get frustrated when you put alot of effort into a tutorial, and can see it when you searcg, but its not approved? It's SOOOO frustrating! Haha
I know, it requires staff, and im not complaining. I just wanted to let out my anger in a moparscape topic, I guess...

item.title: Post here if you dont like it when you post a tutorial, and dunno where it goes
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:2, topic:305611”]The staff members created an approval system in order to rid the tutorial section of inane tutorials. Instead of ranting, PM the staff member that declined your tutorial.

On the other hand, your tutorial may not even have been looked at yet. It can take a few days.[/quote]

Dont think it has been looked at yet, and I wasnt meant be a rant -.- Although it seemed to turn out as one.

Read full topic
item.source: Post here if you dont like it when you post a tutorial, and dunno where it goes

item.title: Post here if you dont like it when you post a tutorial, and dunno where it goes
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

The staff members created an approval system in order to rid the tutorial section of inane tutorials. Instead of ranting, PM the staff member that declined your tutorial.

On the other hand, your tutorial may not even have been looked at yet. It can take a few days.

Read full topic
